name: Teer Semolina Suji
description:
TEER Semolina is milled from selected high-protein wheat from Canada, America, Australia, and Russia using top-notch Swiss technologies from Buhler. TEER Semolina is the result of attention to detail, consistency in milling, and a desire to ensure the very best baking experience possible, every time. Only selected fine semolina is packed for the consumers to ensure taste as well as nutrition.

name: Kolson Special Lascha Semai
description:
Kolson Special Lascha Semai is a fine, delicate vermicelli perfect for making traditional desserts like Shemai or Payesh. Its soft texture cooks quickly and blends beautifully with milk, sugar, and cardamom. Ideal for special occasions or everyday indulgence. Enjoy the rich taste of tradition.

name: ACI Pure Suji
description:
ACI Pure Suji is produced from the finest wheat using state of the art European technology. The advanced techniques help to retain vitamins, proteins and fibers ensuring the health and nutrition of the whole family. To ensure good hygiene the entire grinding and packaging process of ACI Pure Suji is automated and untouched and packed in a food grade LLDPE bag to retain its freshness and natural taste. It is best for preparing Suji-Halua, Suji-Barfi, Aflatoon and many more delicious items.

name: Radhuni Shemai
description:
Radhuni shemai has superb taste. it is smooth, lean & thin, and easy to prepare. Radhuni shemai is hygienically manufactured from the finest quality flour which ensures delicious jorda shemai, milk shemai & falooda.

name: Fresh Suji
description:
Fresh Suji, also known as semolina or rava, is a coarse flour made from durum wheat. The 500 gm packaging indicates that it contains approximately 500 grams of suji.

name: Olympic Lascha Shemai
description:
The Olympic Lascha Shemai 200 gm is a traditional South Asian vermicelli product commonly used for preparing both sweet and savory dishes. Made from high-quality wheat flour, it has a fine texture that ensures consistent cooking. This shemai is perfect for preparing desserts like kheer, payesh, or sweet pudding, as well as savory recipes like semai pulao. Ideal for special occasions or daily meals, it is a versatile ingredient celebrated for its delicate taste and premium quality.

name: ACME Vermicelli Shemai
description:
ACME Vermicelli Shemai is crafted from the finest durum wheat semolina, ensuring top-notch quality.Shemai, also known as vermicelli, is a beloved ingredient in various traditional desserts and savory dishes.These thin, delicate strands cook rapidly, making them perfect for busy kitchens.Use it to prepare creamy rice puddings like firni or payesh.Shemai pairs well with savory flavors too.

name: Banoful Lashcha Shemai
description:
Banoful Laccha Shemai is a popular food item in Bangladesh. Especially during Eid. Almost every Muslim Origin: Bangladesh household makes Shemai to celebrate Eid. People of all ages love Shemai a lot. Laccha Shemai brings the countryâ€™s best laccha shemai to the table. Making Shemai requires no hard effort. Just put Laccha Shemai into hot boiling milk with sugar. It takes a few minutes to get this job done.

name: Bombay Sweets Instant Laccha Shemai
description:
Bombay Sweets Instant Laccha Shemai (180 gm) is a ready-to-cook product made from finely shredded wheat flour. It is ideal for preparing traditional Bengali desserts like Shemai (vermicelli) with ease and convenience. This instant laccha shemai is quick to cook and can be used to prepare a variety of sweet or savory dishes, such as milk-based desserts or fried snacks. The product is packaged in a 180 gm quantity, making it suitable for smaller servings, and it offers a versatile addition to your kitchen essentials. Ingredients: Wheat flour, Starch, Palm olein. Nutrition facts- Calories 545, protein 13g & No cholesterol.

name: Bashundhara Suji
description:
